name: pink lady baby booties
notes:
**what you'll need**
3.50mm (e) crochet hook
80yds dk yarn (8ply) - king cole cottonsoft (rose petal, ecru)
tapestry needle

**size:**
pattern is made for 0 - 6 months old. changes for size 6- 12 months are in [ ]. 
finished measurements (sole length)
0 - 6 month old – 9cm 
6 - 12 month old – 10cm

**gauge**
4 rows & 5 stitches in hdc  = 1 inch

**stitches & abbreviations**
st(s) – stitch(es)
ch – chain stitch
sl st - slip stitch
sc – single crochet
sc2tog - single crochet 2 together
hdc - half double crochet
dc2tog - double crochet 2 together
